        Create a multilayer perceptron
        Parameters:
        nodeCounts - the number of nodes in each layer
        transfer - the transfer function
        Returns:
        a multilayer perceptron with nodeCounts.length layers

      • createRegressionNetwork

        public BackPropagationNetwork createRegressionNetwork(int[] nodeCounts,
                                                      DifferentiableActivationFunction transfer)
        Create a multilayer perceptron
        Parameters:
        nodeCounts - the number of nodes in each layer
        transfer - a list of transfer functions for each layer, except the last layer
        Returns:
        a multilayer perceptron with nodeCounts.length layers
